name: Jingwon
aura: Increase Ally HP in in all Battles by 33

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Transfers a random debuff from this Champion to the target.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of increasing the duration of 2 random debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Also places a [Block Active skills] debuff for 1 turn if the target is under a [Decrease ACC] debuff or [Decrease C. DMG] debuff.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. The first hit has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has an 80% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease C. DMG] debuff for 2 turns. Also places a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

skills.desc:
Immune to [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], and [Petrification] debuffs. 

Whenever a [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], or [Petrification] debuff is placed on an ally, removes it and places a [Block Debuffs] buff on that ally for 2 turns.
